predicate.note: Frames file for 'carpet' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: SPRUCING UP THE DIGS: About 200 employees of the Maryland Department of Economic and Employment Development for four months painted walls, polished and carpeted floors, bought plants, cleaned windows and blinds, and hung pictures at the agency's Baltimore office.
example.arg: About 200 employees of the Maryland Department of Economic and Employment Development
